Byte Pool Size per instance should be > 600 bytes for AES key types and > 1200 bytes for RSA key types.
For AES key types, key_size must be from AES 128/192/256/Xts 128/ Xts 256-bits. For RSA key types, key_size must be from RSA 1024/2048-bits.
For AES XTS chaining mode, Key size must be AES /Xts 128-bits/Xts 256-bits.
